items.title: Beyond AI Literacy: Why Double Literacy Is The Future Of Innovation
items.description: At the heart of navigating our AI-saturated society lies a critical skillset: double literacy. Article 4 of the new EU AI Act brings this to the foref...

items.title: Yes, Kendrick Lamar’s Super Bowl Halftime Show Was On A PlayStation Controller
items.description: Was Kendrick Lamar picking random shapes or was his Super Bowl halftime show deliberately being performed on a PlayStation DualShock controller?

items.title: Yes, AI Is Capable Of Improving Trust—Here’s How
items.description: Ironically, AI, often criticized for exacerbating digital deception and misinformation, holds immense potential to improve trust.
